goal.ch: 以C程式 撰寫能重覆使用功能方塊，並用功能方塊組織涉及訊號擷取，處理，控制決策，以及控制輸出之各式專題。
goal.en: o programs reuseable functional blocks , and use functional blocks to organize various topics related to signal acquisition, processing, control decision-making, and control output.

outline.ch:
1. 專題 程式環境-IDE(Use VSCode GCC-AVR ＆ GitLab)(12％)
2. 專題 資料記載及運算( 常數，變數，變數指標，型態與初始化)(12％)
3. 專題 同型資料群記載及運算(陣列，陣列指標，及For回路)(12％)
4. 專題 異型資料群記載及運算(結構體，列舉體，及 switch case 分岔)(12％)
5. 專題 功能方塊化程式(函式，結構體，資料連線，觸動連線，管道排程器)(12％)
6. 專題 計算機(外部中斷分享器，即時輸出入埠功能方塊 )(20％)
7. 專題 輪型機器人(計時中斷分享器，即時輸出入埠功能方塊 )(20％)
8. 專題 仿生機器人(計時中斷分享器，即時輸出入埠功能方塊，PWM命令)(20％)
9. 專題 數位溫度計(SPI串列通訊用法)(20％)
10. 專題  溫度控制器(TWI串列通訊用法)(20％)
11. 專題  萬年曆(系統時鐘用法)(20％)
12. 專題  數位錄音機(單通道ADC，批次緩衝區用法)(20％)
13. 專題  數位播音機(批次緩衝區，PWM埠用法)(20％)
14. 專題  數位語音通訊器( 收音封包傳送,  接收解包播音)(20％)
15. 專題  數位示波器(多通道ADC輸入埠及緩衝區 用法 )(20％)
outline.en:
1. Topic: Programming Environment-IDE (Use VSCode GCC-AVR ＆ GitLab)
2. Topic: Data recording and operations (constants, variables, variable indicators, types and initialization)
3. Topic:  Same Type Data Group Recording and Operation (Array, Array Index, and For Loop)
4. Topic: Mixed Type Data Group Recording and Operation (struct, enum, and switch case bifurcation)
5. Topic: Function Block Programming (Functions, Structures, Data Wires, Triger Wires, Pipeline Scheduler)
6. Topic: Calculator (external interrupt sharer, real-time input and output port function block)
7. Topic: wheeled robot (timer interrupt sharer, real-time input and output port function block)
8. Topic: Bionic robot (timer interrupt sharer, real-time input and output port function block, PWM command)
9. Topic: Digital Thermometer (SPI Serial Communication Usage)
10. Topic:  Temperature Controller (TWI Serial Communication Usage)
11. Topic: Perpetual Calendar (System Clock Usage)
12. Topic: Digital Recorder (Single Channel ADC, Batch Buffer Usage)
13. Topic: Digital broadcaster (batch buffer, PWM port usage)
14. Topic: Digital Voice Communicator (Radio Packet Transmission, Receive Unpacket Broadcast)
15. Topic: Digital oscilloscope (multi-channel ADC input port and buffer usage)

textbook.ch: COS4M課程講義 江士標博士著
textbook.en: COS4M Lecture note by Dr. SB Jiang.

gradMethod.ch: 基本專題5個各12％共60％。進階自選專題2個各20％共40％
gradMethod.en: 5 Basic Topic Experiments. 12％per topic。2 Advanced Special topic each 20％

officeHour.ch: 星期二 下午 1 點

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
